name: Bejeweled 2 Deluxe Saved Game
summary: Learn about .BEJEWELED2DELUXESAVEDGAME files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Bejeweled 2 Deluxe is a popular puzzle video game published by PopCap Games. In the game, players move gems to create three-of-a-kind (or more) matches that clear gems and score points. After a player scores a certain amount of points, they advance to the next level.
In Endless mode and Puzzle mode, Bejeweled 2 Deluxe automatically saves a player's progress after they complete a level. These saved games are stored in BEJEWELED2DELUXESAVEDGAME files.

description: A BEJEWELED2DELUXESAVEDGAME file is a saved game created by Bejeweled 2 Deluxe. It contains a record of a player's Endless or Puzzle mode progress, including what levels they've cleared and how many points they've scored. Bejeweled 2 Deluxe uses BEJEWELED2DELUXESAVEDGAME files to let players resume playing where they left off.

instructions: Players cannot manually open BEJEWELED2DELUXESAVEDGAME files. To resume a saved Bejeweled 2 Deluxe Game, open the game and select the corresponding game mode.
